item.title: Hallow
item.description: Hallow are a sacred place that Mages creates for Oblation and Meditation. It’s a safe haven for the Mages and a focal point for the supernal in the Fallen World.

item.title: Mana
item.description: In universe Mana is the palpable, measurable bleed of the Supernal into the material. It’s a Prime energy, a quintessential force that comes from the energy trapped when the Abyss came into existence, or sometimes comes into existence from the glory and greatness of the world.
